author: James Joyce
text: Dear Helen: The girl has just found this in a chair under a cushion. David must have forgotten it and he may not have a copy and the one he sent to Stories at E. J’s suggestion may not be returned so will you please send it on to him as I have not heard from him since he left and don’t know his address. Glad to hear you are beginning to go out into society again. Keep it up, Keep it up! Tante cose! Babbo
